Import Data
```{r}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```
Data set description
```{r}
n_rows <- nrow(penguins)
n_cols <- ncol(penguins)
mean_flipper_length <- mean(penguins$flipper_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE)
```
This dataset has 8 cols and 344 rows in total.The columns contains 8 different variables which are species, island, bill length, bill depth, flipper length, body mass, sex and year. The mean flipper length is 200.92 mm.
